Demo.signUpToSave: Sign up to save your scripts and recordings

hero.title: Glean Teleprompter
hero.description: Write, rehearse, and record your scripts with ease. Perfect for YouTubers, podcasters, presenters, and anyone who speaks to an audience.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Powerful features to create professional content

smartTeleprompter.title: Smart Teleprompter
smartTeleprompter.description: Adjustable speed, fonts, colors, and mirror mode for reflectors

builtInRecording.title: Built-in Recording
builtInRecording.description: Record yourself while reading the script with camera overlay

cloudSync.title: Cloud Sync
cloudSync.description: Save scripts securely and access from any device

customPresets.title: Custom Presets
customPresets.description: Save your favorite configurations and apply with one click

cta.title: Ready to Start Creating?
cta.description: Join thousands of content creators who use Glean Teleprompter to create professional videos and presentations.

Toast.upgradePrompt: Upgrade to Pro to upload custom music.

Auth.loginDescription: Enter your email below to login to your account
Auth.resetPasswordDescription: Type in your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password
Auth.checkEmailMessage: If you registered using your email and password, you will receive a password reset email.
Auth.updatePasswordDescription: Please enter your new password below.

Protected.description: This is a protected page. Add your content here.

SignUpSuccess.title: Thank you for signing up!
SignUpSuccess.message: You've successfully signed up. Please check your email to confirm your account before signing in.

StorageQuota.title: Storage Usage
StorageQuota.critical: Storage almost full! Delete old recordings or upgrade your plan.
StorageQuota.warning: Running low on storage. Consider managing your recordings.

RecordingsLibrary.noRecordingsDesc: Your recordings will appear here once you create them.
RecordingsLibrary.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this recording? This action cannot be undone.
RecordingsLibrary.bulkDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {count} recording(s)? This action cannot be undone.

PermissionDialog.cameraDesc: To use the camera feature, we need access to your camera. This allows you to see yourself while recording.
PermissionDialog.microphoneDesc: To record videos with audio, we need access to your microphone. Your audio will be recorded along with the video.
PermissionDialog.bothDesc: To record videos, we need access to both your camera and microphone. This allows you to record yourself with audio.
PermissionDialog.privacy: Privacy: Your camera and microphone data is processed locally and only used for your recordings. We don't access your media without your permission.
PermissionDialog.learnMore: Learn how to manage browser permissions

RecordingModal.title: Recording Preview
RecordingModal.description: Review your recording before saving or discard.

Config.title: Configuration

header.clearHistoryDescription: Are you sure you want to clear all undo/redo history? This action cannot be undone.
header.description: Configure teleprompter settings including typography, colors, effects, layout, and animations

tabTooltips.typography: Configure font family, size, weight, and spacing
tabTooltips.colors: Set text colors, gradients, and check contrast
tabTooltips.effects: Add shadows, outlines, glows, and backdrop blur
tabTooltips.layout: Adjust margins, padding, alignment, and columns
tabTooltips.animations: Configure scroll, entrance animations, and highlighting
tabTooltips.presets: Save, load, and manage configuration presets
tabTooltips.music: Configure background music and player widget

Config.selectTab: Select a tab to configure settings

typography.title: Typography Settings
typography.description: Configure font family, size, weight, and spacing for your teleprompter text.

tooltips.letterSpacing: Adjust spacing between characters for readability
tooltips.lineHeight: Control the vertical space between lines of text
tooltips.textTransform: Change text case for emphasis or style
tooltips.fontFamily: Choose from Google Fonts or system fonts
tooltips.fontSize: Set the base size of your text
tooltips.fontWeight: Adjust how bold or light the text appears

colors.title: Color Settings
colors.description: Configure text colors, gradients, and contrast validation.

tooltips.primaryTextColor: Set the main color for your text
tooltips.wcagCompliance: Check if your text meets accessibility standards
tooltips.enableGradient: Add a gradient effect to text fill

effects.title: Visual Effects
effects.description: Configure shadows, outlines, glows, and backdrop filters for enhanced readability.

outline.label: Text Outline
outline.description: Add border around text for better visibility

shadow.label: Text Shadow
shadow.description: Add depth to text with shadow

tooltips.shadow: Add drop shadow behind text for depth
tooltips.outline: Add stroke around text edges for clarity
tooltips.glow: Add soft glow effect around text
tooltips.backdropBlur: Blur the background behind the teleprompter

layout.title: Layout Settings
layout.description: Configure margins, padding, alignment, and text area positioning.

tooltips.horizontalMargin: Space between text and screen edges (left/right)
tooltips.verticalPadding: Space between text and top/bottom of screen
tooltips.textAlign: Align text to left, center, right, or justify
tooltips.columns: Split text into multiple columns for reading
tooltips.textAreaWidth: Width of the text area as percentage of screen
tooltips.textAreaPosition: Position the text area on screen

animations.title: Animation Settings
animations.description: Configure scroll behaviors, entrance animations, and highlighting.

tooltips.smoothScroll: Enable smooth, damped scrolling for better control
tooltips.wordHighlighting: Highlight current word as you read
tooltips.autoScroll: Automatically scroll text at constant speed

presets.title: Presets
presets.description: Save, load, and manage your configuration presets.
presets.name: Name

presetGrid.createFirst: Create your first preset to get started

tooltips.savePreset: Save current settings as a reusable preset
tooltips.import: Import a preset from a JSON file
tooltips.builtinPresets: Pre-made configurations for common use cases
tooltips.sync: Sync your presets with cloud storage

media.title: Media Settings
media.description: Configure background images, music, and other media assets.
media.enterBackgroundImageUrl: Enter a URL to link to online background image
media.enterBackgroundMusicUrl: Enter a URL to link to online background music

tooltips.backgroundImage: Set an image as the teleprompter background
tooltips.backgroundMusic: Add background music to play during recording
tooltips.useUrl: Enter a URL to link to online media
tooltips.upload: Upload media files from your device (Pro feature)

network.title: Network Error
network.message: Network error. Check your connection and try again
network.details: Unable to reach the server. Please check your internet connection.

notFound.title: Script Not Found
notFound.message: Script not found. It may have been deleted or the link is incorrect
notFound.details: The requested script does not exist or has been removed.

permission.title: Permission Denied
permission.message: You don't have permission to view this script
permission.details: This script is private or you need to sign in to access it.

quota.title: Storage Full
quota.message: Storage full. Some browsers limit local storage.
quota.details: Your browser storage quota has been exceeded. Consider saving to your account or clearing old data.

unknown.title: Unexpected Error
unknown.details: Something went wrong. Please try again.

KeyboardShortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
KeyboardShortcuts.description: Work more efficiently with keyboard shortcuts

Performance.largeScriptWarning: This script is very long ({count}+ characters). For best performance, consider splitting it into multiple scripts.

DraftManagementDialog.title: Saved Drafts
DraftManagementDialog.description: Manage your local drafts. Restore a draft to edit it or delete old drafts to free up space.
DraftManagementDialog.noDraftsDesc: Your drafts will appear here as you work.
DraftManagementDialog.tip: Tip: Use arrow keys to navigate, Enter to restore, Delete to remove selected drafts

metadata.title: Glean Teleprompter - Professional Teleprompter for Content Creators
metadata.description: Write, rehearse, and record your scripts with ease. Perfect for YouTubers, podcasters, presenters, and anyone who speaks to an audience.

Dashboard.subtitle: Manage your recordings, scripts, presets, and settings
Dashboard.manageScriptsDesc: View and edit your saved scripts
Dashboard.gettingStartedDesc: New to Glean Teleprompter? Here's how to get started:
Dashboard.step1: Click "Open Studio" to create your first teleprompter script
Dashboard.step2: Customize font, colors, and scroll speed to your preference
Dashboard.step3: Save your scripts to the cloud and share them with others
Dashboard.step4: Use camera recording to capture yourself while reading

DemoPage.saveWarning: Demo Mode: Sign up to save your scripts and recordings

QuickStartPage.title: Quick Start with Templates
QuickStartPage.description: Choose a template to get started faster. Each template comes with pre-configured settings and sample content that you can customize.
QuickStartPage.dontSeeTemplate: Don't see a template you like?

SharedScriptPage.scriptNotFound: Script not found or not publicly shared

MusicPlayer.title: Music Player
MusicPlayer.description: Configure background music for your teleprompter sessions

settings.title: Music Settings
settings.description: Choose your music source and widget style

youtube.label: YouTube URL
youtube.description: Paste a YouTube video URL to use as background music
youtube.help: The video will play audio-only to avoid distractions

upload.label: Upload Audio File
upload.description: Upload an MP3, WAV, M4A, OGG, AAC, or FLAC file
upload.supportedFormats: Supported formats: MP3, WAV, M4A, OGG, AAC, FLAC

widgetStyle.label: Widget Style
widgetStyle.description: Choose how the music player looks in Runner mode

vinylSpeed.label: Vinyl Rotation Speed
vinylSpeed.description: How fast the record rotates (Vinyl style only)
